title: Singhing Bee
description: Harjinder (Honey) Singh is a 12-year-old Sikh Indian-American boy poised on the brink of a major turning point in his life. His parents' obsession with raising a national spelling bee champion sharply conflicts with his desire to pursue more creative interests. This humorous short film chronicles Honey's journey to determine the right path for him.
